column3:
ANNUAL DEGREE SHOW

The Degree Show 2007 is open to the public from Saturday 16th June until Saturday 23th June 2007. Please use the links on the left to find out more about previous Degree Shows and opening times.

DEGREE SHOW 2007 IS SPONSORED BY:

  • DLA Piper
  • Vladivar Foundation

The Product Design Engineering Degree Show is also sponsored by Marks & Clerk Scotland.

If you are interested in sponsoring the Degree Show in 2007, please contact the Marketing and Development Office on +44 (0) 141 353 4710 or marketing@gsa.ac.uk
